name: Eiffel Tower
description: A wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars, named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, it is one of the most iconic structures in the world and the most-visited paid monument in the world.
short_description: Iconic iron tower offering panoramic views of Paris.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A series of fortifications made of various materials, the Great Wall stretches over 13,000 miles and is a historical monument symbolizing the strength and resilience of ancient China.
short_description: Massive ancient wall stretching over 13,000 miles.

name: Colosseum
description: An ancient amphitheater built for gladiatorial contests and public spectacles. It remains one of the greatest works of Roman architecture and engineering.
short_description: Ancient arena used for gladiatorial games.

name: Machu Picchu
description: A 15th-century Inca citadel set high in the Andes Mountains, Machu Picchu is an architectural marvel and one of the most famous ancient sites in the world.
short_description: Ancient Inca city perched on a mountain top.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: A multi-venue performing arts center, the Sydney Opera House is one of the most recognizable and iconic buildings in the world.
short_description: World-famous performance arts venue in Sydney.

name: Taj Mahal
description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum built in memory of Mumtaz Mahal, the Taj Mahal is a symbol of eternal love and one of the New Seven Wonders of the World.
short_description: Beautiful white marble mausoleum and symbol of love.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: Ancient pyramid structures, including the Great Pyramid, built as tombs for pharaohs. These monumental structures are among the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
short_description: Ancient pyramids, including the Great Pyramid.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: A colossal neoclassical sculpture gifted by France to the United States, it stands as a symbol of freedom and democracy.
short_description: Famous statue symbolizing freedom and democracy.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: A towering statue of Jesus Christ that overlooks Rio de Janeiro, the Christ the Redeemer statue is one of the largest and most recognized art deco sculptures in the world.
short_description: Massive statue of Jesus Christ overlooking Rio.

name: Santorini
description: A volcanic island in the Aegean Sea, Santorini is known for its stunning sunsets, whitewashed buildings, and blue-domed churches, offering breathtaking views of the sea and the caldera.
short_description: Stunning island with iconic white buildings and blue domes.

name: Mount Fuji
description: Mount Fuji is an active stratovolcano and the highest peak in Japan, standing at 3,776 meters. It is a popular destination for climbers and a symbol of Japan's natural beauty.
short_description: Iconic, snow-capped volcano and highest peak in Japan.

name: Palace of Versailles
description: A former royal château, the Palace of Versailles is renowned for its opulent architecture, stunning gardens, and its pivotal role in French history.
short_description: Lavish palace with spectacular gardens and architecture.

name: Stonehenge
description: Stonehenge is a prehistoric monument consisting of a ring of standing stones, its exact purpose still debated, and remains a mystery to historians and archaeologists.
short_description: Prehistoric stone circle with unknown origins.

name: Big Ben
description: Big Ben, officially known as the Elizabeth Tower, is a famous clock tower at the north end of the Palace of Westminster, one of London’s most iconic landmarks.
short_description: Famous clock tower and symbol of London.

name: Niagara Falls
description: Niagara Falls is a group of three waterfalls on the border between the United States and Canada, known for their breathtaking beauty and as a popular tourist attraction.
short_description: Massive waterfalls on the US-Canada border.

name: Sagrada Familia
description: A large basilica designed by architect Antoni Gaudí, the Sagrada Familia has been under construction for over 100 years and is a stunning example of modernist architecture.
short_description: Stunning basilica designed by Gaudí in Barcelona.

name: Acropolis of Athens
description: The Acropolis is an ancient citadel on a rocky outcrop above Athens, home to several significant buildings, including the Parthenon, which dates back to the 5th century BC.
short_description: Ancient citadel with historic structures like the Parthenon.

name: Banff National Park
description: Banff National Park is a vast, stunning national park located in the Canadian Rockies, known for its picturesque lakes, glaciers, and snow-capped mountains.
short_description: A scenic national park in the Canadian Rockies.

name: Alhambra
description: The Alhambra is a palace and fortress complex that dates back to the 13th century, blending Islamic art and architecture with Christian and Jewish influences.
short_description: Historic palace and fortress with stunning Islamic architecture.

name: Dubai Burj Khalifa
description: The Burj Khalifa is the tallest skyscraper in the world, standing at 828 meters, and is a symbol of Dubai's modern architectural prowess and economic growth.
short_description: World's tallest building offering breathtaking city views.
